TART: Radio-telescope high-level HTTP interface
===============================================

This module is used to communicate with the TART radio telescope. It
listens on a port on localhost, and allows a web-based interface to
communicate with the TART hardware.

For more information see the `TART github
repository <https://github.com/tmolteno/TART>`__

Development work
----------------

If you are developing this package, this should be installed using

::

    python setyp.py develop

in which case changes to the source-code will be immediately available
to projects using it.
